decks.notes: The deck focuses on casting disruptive spells like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon to shut down opponents' lands, while using fast mana sources like Ancient Tomb and Chrome Mox. It also aims to quickly ramp into powerful Dragon creatures like Pyrogoyf and Fury, applying pressure on the opponent. The deck is designed to be proactive and aggressive, leveraging its disruptive elements to control the game and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats. It also incorporates artifact support cards like The One Ring and Vexing Bauble to enhance its strategy.

This deck revolves around utilizing Mystic Forge to continuously cast artifacts from the top of the library, generating card advantage and enabling powerful combos. It aims to assemble a strong board presence using artifacts like Glaring Fleshraker and The One Ring, while also disrupting opponents with cards like Pithing Needle. The deck includes various mana acceleration tools like Lotus Petal and Urza's Workshop to quickly reach its combo pieces. Karn, the Great Creator grants access to silver bullet sideboard options, while Voltaic Key and Grim Monolith provide additional ways to generate mana for explosive plays.

The deck focuses on assembling the combo of Nomads en-Kor and Springheart Nantuko to create a loop of creature untaps and damage triggers. Nadu, Winged Wisdom acts as the key piece to draw through the deck and find the combo pieces needed to win the game. The deck also includes various green mana accelerants like Noble Hierarch and Gaea's Cradle to ramp into the combo quickly. Leovold, Emissary of Trest and other disruptive creatures like Collector Ouphe are included to disrupt opponents' strategies and protect the combo.

The deck focuses on using Nadu, Winged Wisdom as the key combo piece to generate card advantage and control the board. It utilizes Green Sun's Zenith to search for Nadu and protect it with counterspells like Force of Will. The deck also includes cards like Prismatic Ending and Swords to Plowshares for removal, as well as cards like Teferi, Time Raveler for additional control. The mana base includes fetch lands and dual lands for consistency, and the inclusion of cards like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath provide additional value to stay ahead in the game.

Utilize disruptive spells and evasive creatures to control the board and apply pressure to opponents quickly in order to outpace them and secure victory. The deck focuses on tempo plays, utilizing cards like Daze and Force of Will to counter opponents' spells while deploying threats like Murktide Regent and Brazen Borrower to close out the game. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Psychic Frog provide card advantage and filtering, while Fatal Push and Thoughtseize help deal with opposing threats. Wasteland and other land disruption cards are included to disrupt opponents' mana bases and slow them down.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and efficiently reanimate powerful creatures from the graveyard, such as Archon of Cruelty and Griselbrand, using cards like Reanimate, Animate Dead, and Entomb. It also incorporates disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Show and Tell can be used to cheat out big threats like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Valgavoth, Terror Eater. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and disruption to secure a victory.
